definition: theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe

sentences.english: But formaldehyde is virulent, that must do a great harm to the persons.
sentences.chinese: 因为甲醛有剧毒，会对人体造成很大的伤害。

sentences.english: The poison is in her blood and on her breath.
sentences.chinese: 现在她的血液和呼吸中毒有剧毒。

sentences.english: Its common name, to you and I, is the nightshade and it is highly poisonous.
sentences.chinese: 对我们来说，它统一的名字是夜影，它也有剧毒。

sentences.english: Nutmeg is extremely poisonous if injected intravenously.
sentences.chinese: 如果在静脉里注射肉豆蔻是有剧毒的。

sentences.english: R32 Contact with acid liberates very toxic gas.
Yongzhou elapidaes refer to several poisonous snakes in cobra family with high medical value.
sentences.chinese: 永州异蛇系指眼镜蛇科的几种剧毒蛇。

sentences.english: Cyanide is highly toxic to living organism.
sentences.chinese: 氰化物对生物有机体有剧毒。

sentences.english: Originally there is countless only crawled contains poisonous scorpions.
sentences.chinese: 原来里面竟然是无数只爬动着的含有剧毒的蝎子。

sentences.english: But if it is eaten by a man, it can kill with its deadly poison .
sentences.chinese: 但是如果人吃了它，有可能会因花的剧毒而丧命。

sentences.english: But no one dared go near it, because its thoms were full of poison.
sentences.chinese: 但是没有人敢接近它，因为她的刺上含有剧毒。

sentences.english: Sea snakes generally possess very toxic venoms.
It strikes with the alacrity of the vilest viper, sapping your will with oaths to its venomous god.
sentences.chinese: 他向剧毒之神发誓，将以卑劣剧毒猛烈打击你的意志。

sentences.english: It strikes with the alacrity of the vilest viper, sapping your will with oaths to its venomous god.
sentences.chinese: 他向剧毒之神发誓，将以卑劣剧毒猛烈打击你的意志。

sentences.english: Airborne mercury can change into a highly toxic form after falling into waterways.
sentences.chinese: 如果空气当中的汞进入到水系中，会产生剧毒。

sentences.english: It is a horrible being that spews forth noxious vapors and tramples lesser beings.
sentences.chinese: 这种可怕的生物呼出剧毒空气，践踏比自己小的生物。

definition: poison gas/toxic gas/manifestation of passion, anger etc (Buddhism)
a poison/a toxic agent/poison gas/a chemical weapon
